FirstDialogue: ^Hello dear, how can I help you?

s: ^I got the apples for your apple pie!
^I've heard from Chip that you are worried about something.

TellingWorries: ^Oh, did he notice that? Well, what can I say, I've gotten to old to make my favourite dish for Nosh-Up, my beloved apple pie, on my own.

s: ^I can help you later if you want!

CheckDarcy: ^That's too sweet of you, dear! Old Darcy is doing just fine.
OfferHelp: ^That would be great! I've witnessed Nosh-Up and its beauty for multiple centuries, it would make me very sad to not be able to bring my favourite dish to this year's Nosh-Up.
HelpLater: ^Oh dear, that would be fantastic! I'll be here if you find the time for an old lady like me.
GetInfo: ^For my apple pie I need three apples in total. To get those apples, could you shake the apple tree next to my house? My house is right in front of your house.

s: ^I can do that, when I find the time for it.

StartQuest: ^Thank you, dear. Old Darcy will be waiting for you here.
StartQuestLater: ^Don't worry, dear. Do your things first before helping me out. If you find the time for my case, just come by.
ContinueQuest: ^That's great, dear! But I'm sorry to tell you that I'm not capable of making the apple pie, I'm too old for this... But I know someone who might be able to make this apple pie. Here, take those apples and go to Caroline, she can help us out!
ReminderCaroline: ^Hello dear, I hope Caroline will be able to make the apple pie before Nosh-Up starts...
